description: Triangle T(n,k) of n X n binary matrices with k=0..n^2 ones under action of dihedral group of the square D_4.
comments: From _Geoffrey Critzer_, Feb 19 2013: (Start)Cycle indices for n=2,3,4,5 respectively are:(1/8)(s[1]^4 + 2*s[1]^2*s[2] + 3*s[2]^2 + 2*s[4]).(1/8)(s[1]^9 + 4*s[1]^3*s[2]^3 + s[1]s[2]^4 + 2*s[1]*s[4]^2).(1/8)(s[1]^16 + 2*s[1]^4*s[2]^6 + 2*s[4]^4 + 3*s[2]^8).(1/8)(s[1]^25 + 4*s[1]^5*s[2]^10 + 2*s[1]*s[4]^6 + s[1]*s[2]^12).(End)Also the number of equivalence classes of ways of placing k 1 X 1 tiles in an n X n square under all symmetry operations of the square. - _Christopher Hunt Gribble_, Feb 17 2014
links: Index entries for sequences related to groups
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 04 2000
